title: Data-log 158-39

replies.body:
> “PLEASE MISS, SUCH LANGUAGE IS NOT APPROPRIATE FOR A LADY TO BE HEARD USING. MAY I OFFER YOU A FEW CHILD-FRIENDLY REPLACEMENTS?”

Flip, this was a thoroughly enjoyable read from start to finish! 

You're absolutely spot-on with your portrayal of Blitzcrank - I suppose accidental acts of cruelty and complete ignorance of fleshling's pain aren't really appropriate for the genre you were trying to achieve - and you excellently applied existing lore material into your original story. 

By any chance, have you read the [Blitzcrank <3 Orianna Comic](http://imgur.com/a/swG5V)? It is a bit 'darker', but all the same, these sort of pieces just make me glad Blitzcrank is part of the league, ey?

Thank you :). No, while I am aware that Blitzcrank has the potential to hurt fleshlings due to a lack of understanding I really wanted to capture the human like nature in a robot body, sweet air Blitzcrank has about him. 
Yes I have! It is beautiful a beautiful piece (both in look and feel), even if it is a bit dark. And you're right, it's pieces like these that make the two of them such great champions to get to know :).
